pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sliced Latin Hypercube Designs // A facility to generate sliced (orthogonal) Latin hypercube designs with four and five slices. For details about sliced and orthogonal Latin hypercube designs, see Yang, J. F., Lin, C. D., Qian, P. Z., and Lin, D. K. (2013). "Construction of sliced orthogonal Latin hypercube designs". Statistica Sinica, 1117-1130, doi:10.5705/ss.2012.037.
